emails.subject: Q4 Budget Review Meeting
emails.body: Hi team, reminder that we have the Q4 budget review tomorrow at 2pm. Please come prepared with your department estimates. @you - can you bring the engineering headcount projections?

emails.subject: RE: API Migration Timeline
emails.body: We decided to push the API migration to January 15th. All teams agreed this gives us buffer for the holiday freeze. Action item: Update the project roadmap by Friday.

emails.subject: Year-end Performance Reviews Due
emails.body: Reminder: All manager performance reviews must be submitted by December 15th. Please complete your direct reports' reviews in Workday.

messages.text: @you Can you review PR #482 for the auth service? It's blocking the release.
Team decision: We're standardizing on PostgreSQL 16 for all new services. Please update your local environments.
The CI pipeline is failing on main. Anyone else seeing this? Need help debugging.
Customer feedback session scheduled for Thursday 3pm. @you are you available to join and represent engineering?
Decision made: We're prioritizing the mobile app redesign over the dashboard refresh for Q1.
Standup reminder: Please post your updates in the thread. @you what's your status on the integration work?
Blocker: The staging environment is down. DevOps is investigating. ETA 2 hours.
All-hands meeting moved to Monday 10am. Key topic: 2025 company goals. Attendance required.
